name: Simple BreadCrumb
author: Jérôme OLLIVIER

sections.description: Simple Breadcrumb is an easy to use plugin, paste the shortcode, and it will appear on your pages
sections.installation:
Upload the Simple Breadcrumb plugin to your blog, activate it, and then paste the [mybreadcrumb] shortcode on your page

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
sections.changelog:
1.3

Enhancements : adding plugin page in WordPress admin sidebar
Additional changes: logo and screenshot in plugin WordPress page
Release Date – 02 February 2023

1.2

Update : PHP Version compatibility since 7.1
Release Date – 02 February 2023

1.1

Fix : shortcode
Release Date – 01 February 2023

1.0

Initial release.
Release Date – 27 January 2023
